hero.title: Smart Hawker: Take Your Business Online, Increase Your Profits!
hero.subtitle: The easiest app for millions of Indian hawkers and small shopkeepers. Accounting, stock management, and customer management, all in one place.
hero.voiceExplanation: Milk (product) will be added to Ramesh (customer) in quantity (2 kilo)

features.title: Everything You Need to Grow Your Business
features.subtitle: Simple tools to help you manage your daily operations

voice.title: Voice-Enabled Sales Entry
voice.description: Stop typing, start talking. Just say "Ramesh ko 2 kilo doodh diya," and Smart Hawker instantly records the sale for you.

invoice.title: Generate & Send Invoices
invoice.description: Create professional invoices in seconds and send them directly to your customers on WhatsApp, ensuring you get paid faster.

credit.title: Digital Credit Ledger (Udhaar)
credit.description: Easily track all customer credit in one secure place. See who owes you money at a glance and settle accounts with a single tap.

inventory.title: Smart Inventory Management
inventory.description: Always know what's in stock. The app automatically updates your inventory with each sale, helping you reduce waste and know when to reorder.

reports.title: Daily Business Reports
reports.description: Get instant, easy-to-read reports on your daily sales, profits, and pending payments to understand your business performance.

multilingual.title: Multilingual Support
multilingual.description: Run your business in the language you are most comfortable with. The app supports English, Hindi, and many other regional languages.

q1.question: Is this app difficult to use?
q1.answer: No! This app is specifically designed for vendors like you. It is very easy to use.

q2.question: What does it cost? Are there any hidden charges?
q2.answer: Most essential features of Smart Hawker are completely FREE. We also have a Premium plan with extra features at a very low cost. There are no hidden charges.

q3.question: Is my business data safe in this app?
q3.answer: Yes, absolutely. All your business data is 100% secure and cannot be seen by anyone except you.
